title: Which current generation leaders do you consider capable of leading India in coming decades?
selftext:
[China Built a Hypersonic Generator That Could Power Unimaginable Weapons (msn.com)](https://www.msn.com/en-us/news/technology/china-built-a-hypersonic-generator-that-could-power-unimaginable-weapons/ar-AA17b6so?rc=1&ocid=winp1taskbar&cvid=a7cee5fabbcf41d5df10b0cf80d73e61&ei=34) 

Amazing advancements in China in past 20 years, in terms of infrastructure, technology etc., with their current footprint in the name of OBOR , unarguably the most influential nation, in current times. India too advanced in last 20 years, thanks to the great leaders & thinkers, in Vajpayee, Manmohan and  Modi's regime. however, there is a huge gap to fill, and a lot needs to be done, What strategies can India employ to bridge the development gap with China? Putting politics aside, which current generation leaders do you consider capable of leading India in the coming decades?
